name: 9-Inch Mini Bolt Cutter - Wire Cutter Heavy Duty for Chains and Screws,CR-V Steel Blade,Spring-Loaded Design,Soft Grip & Lock for Wires, Chains, Screws, Hardware
short_description: Powerful Cutting Capacity: Cuts up to 6 mm (15/64") for soft materials (HRC ≤ 20) and 4 mm (4/25") for harder materials (HRC ≤ 40). Not for locks Premium Cr-V Steel Construction: Drop-forged jaws (HRC 60-62) ensure extreme durability, wear resistance, and clean cuts without bending or breaking Effortless Leverage Design: Classic lever mechanism maximizes cutting force, reducing hand strain while boosting efficiency Compact & Portable: 9" size with handle lock for easy storage and transport—fits perfectly in tool bags for on-the-go tasks Versatile & Reliable: Ideal for industrial, DIY, repairs, and disassembly. A practical gift for men, dads, or handymen on special occasions

name: ARES 70664-8-Inch Mini Bolt Cutter - Chrome Moly Steel Construction & Induction Hardened Cutting Edges - Designed for Heavy Duty Wire, Bolt, Nail & Rivet Cutting
short_description: ITEM SPECIFICATIONS: These mini bolt cutters are designed to handle 5.0mm diameter medium hard wire, 4.0mm diameter hard wire, and 3.6mm Piano Wire. QUALITY: Our 8-inch Mini Bolt Cutter features induction hardened cutting blades rated at over 58 HRC. The heavy duty Chrome Moly construction features a corrosion and rust resistant finish, and the jaw notch recess traps and grips hard wire for enhanced cutting force. Just slide the wire up after making your primary cut for an easy finish. DESIGN CONSIDERATIONS: This mini bolt cutter features a lever system that's designed to cut heavy duty wire, bolts, nails and rivets. The mini bolt cutter's spring design also offers exceptional cutting performance with minimal effort, and the ergonomic handles help to prevent hand fatigue during prolonged use. RELIABLE | EFFECTIVE | EFFICIENT: Users trust ARES to be quality tools. You are backed by our Performance Assurance Limited Lifetime Warranty. If you have any issues with your ARES 8-inch Mini Bolt Cutter, simply contact customer service for troubleshooting help, parts, replacement or refund. ASPCA BUSINESS AMBASSADOR: We are proud to be part of the ASPCA Business Ambassador Program. If you have a pet, you realize they are more than a pet, they are part of the family. With your support, we’re proud to help this great organization.

name: Ryobi 18V ONE+ Bolt Cutter, Bare Tool - P592, (Bulk Packaged, Non-Retail Packaging)
short_description: Ideal for cutting a variety of materials including chain, locks, bolts, fencing, and wire shelving Innovative design to minimize hand and arm fatigue compared to manual bolt cutter Hot forged steel jaws and hardened steel mechanism for maximum durability Jaws open to accommodate materials up to 3/8 in. in diameter Bare Tool, Battery and charger not included. This item is removed from retail packaging for shipping purposes (Bulk Packaged) and will arrive in a generic box.
product_description: RYOBI introduces the new 18V ONE+ Bolt Cutter, designed to replace 14" manual bolt cutters. The hot forged steel jaws open to accommodate materials like chains, locks, bolts, fencing and wire shelving up to 3/8 in. in diameter, and perform up to 200 cuts per charge using a RYOBI High Capacity Lithium+ battery. The innovative design minimizes hand and arm fatigue typically experienced with manual bolt cutter, and the clear sight line in the design allows for optimal visibility of the cut area. Additionally, this tool features separated forward and reverse buttons for precision cutting control and repetitive cuts. This item is removed from retail packaging for shipping purposes (Bulk Packaged) and will arrive in a generic box.

name: Power Grip Bolt Cutter, 39-124, 24 Inches
short_description: Compact & Portable: Patented folding handles let these bolt cutters easily fit into any bag, perfect for on-the-go tasks Durable Cutting Power: CR-MO hardened steel cutting heads ensure long-lasting performance, even on tough jobs Comfort & Control: Extra-wide handles reduce hand pressure, providing comfort and precision in every cut Versatile & Reliable: Ideal for cutting small items, wire, or chains with ease—your go-to heavy-duty tool Space-Saving Design: Store this compact, high-quality bolt cutter in your car or toolbox without sacrificing space
product_description: Olympia Tools 39-124 Power Grip Bolt Cutter, 24-Inch, Compact Bolt Cutter, Easy Storage, CR-MO Hardened-Steel Cutting Blade, Ergonomic Comfort Grips, Heavy-Duty Cutting Strength

name: SHALL 3-Piece Bolt Cutters, 14" Heavy Duty Bolt Cutter, 8" Mini Bolt Cutter, 8" Wire Rope Cutter, Ergonomic Handle, More Efficient Leverage for Cutting Locks, Chains, Iron Wire, Carrying Case Included
short_description: What Included: 14” bolt cutter, max jaw opening is 19/32 in (15mm); 8” wire cutter, max jaw opening is 1/4 in (7mm); 8” wire rope cutter, max jaw opening is 7/16 in (10mm) Efficient Leverage: Classic leverage design and precisely aligned blades deliver stronger cutting strength. Cutting with less effort, much quicker and improve work efficiency Security Lock & Adjustment Screw: Built-in handle lock for easy storage when not in use (8" bolt cutter & 8" wire rope cutter), featured with tightening adjustment screw for adjusting minimum opening in order to prevent excessive force while cutting (14" bolt cutter & 8" wire cutter) Ergonomic Handle: PP+TPR insulated handle with ergonomic and two-color unique design, anti-slip and offer better hand feel, provide greater control and comfort while cutting Carrying Case: Made of black double-deck 600D fabric with high quality for storing these 3 cutters, featured with straps inside for organized storage. Easy to carry, featured with lanyard

name: Fiskars PowerGear Bolt Cutter (24 Inch), Heavy Duty For Cutting Locks, Chains, and Fences, Soft Grip and Ergonomic Handles, Construction and Home Improvement Tools
short_description: PowerGear patented technology boasts leverage-enhancing gears that give you over 30 percent more power when cutting hardened rod Adjustable eccentric bolts allow you to optimize jaw to maintain cut performance over time Forged, heat-treated blades stay sharp, even through heavy use Ergonomic handles with Softgrip help to improve comfort and control Full lifetime warranty
product_description: Experience advanced mechanics and ergonomics with a new generation of bolt cutters that deliver more strength, comfort and control. PowerGear technology gives you over 30 percent more power, especially during the toughest part of the cut. An eccentric bolt can be adjusted for optimal jaw alignment, while forged, heat-treated blades stay sharp through heavy use. Ergonomic handles with Softgrip help to improve comfort and control, while rugged steel construction guarantees long-lasting performance. This design can cut soft materials up to 3/8 inch (<19 HRC) and hard materials up to 1/4 inch (<40 HRC).

name: WORKPRO 18" Bolt Cutter, Chrome Molybdenum Steel Blade, Heavy Duty Bolt Cutter with Soft Rubber Grip, Cutting Tool for Cut Chain, Wire, Screw, Rivet, Black,blue,red
short_description: DROP FORGED CR-MO JAWS-This 18-inch heavy-duty bolt cutter is forged from durable chrome molybdenum steel and powder-coated jaws for corrosion and rust resistance. The Cr-Mo jaws are further strengthened by heat treatment and quenching technical to ensure efficient cutting and long life. SUPPER CUTTING POWER-The bolt cutter has a 1/4-inch cutting capacity for metals with HRC≤42 and a 5/16-inch cutting capacity for metals with HRC<25, with a maximum opening of 8 Millimeters, allowing easier cutting of different metals. ERGONOMIC COMFORTABLE GRIPS-It has TPR material ergonomic handles with anti-slip soft grips to provide extra comfort when cutting, reducing pressure on your hands while offering an improved hold for crisp and controlled cutting. LABOR-SAVING COMPOUND ACTION-The classic lever-fulcrum design and precisely aligned blades deliver added leverage with less effort, magnify the force applied to handles, which are combined with hinges, and transfer power to the jaw and cutting blades, which can easily cut through hard objects. WIDE APPLICATION-The bolt cutter can tackle a variety of cutting tasks, suitable for cutting chains, nets, wires, poles, screws, and other metal materials. Widely used in industrial job sites or home improvement projects, repair jobs, and more.

name: 18-inch Bolt Cutter Heavy Duty - Chrome Molybdenum Steel Blade and Soft Rubber Grip,Cutting Tool for Padlocks, Chains, Wires, Screws, Fence,and Rivets
short_description: 18" Heavy Duty Bolt Cutter: With drop forged joint arms and Cr-Mo blades, 18-inch bolt cutter is designed for maximum strength and durability. It can easily cut through materials up to 6mm thick. With the ability to slice through metals up to 1/4 inch at HRC≤42, and up to 5/16 inch at HRC<25, cutting different materials has never been easier! Our bolt cutter offers a maximum opening of 8mm for effortless cuts Comfortable and Control: The rubber hand grips provide a comfortable and secure grip, allowing for better control and reducing hand fatigue during use. The anti-rust finish ensures long-lasting performance. Versatile Cutting: Our bolt cutters are capable of cutting through the toughest bolts, chains, padlocks, threaded rods, wires, and many other metals. They are perfect for various applications. Lifetime Warranty: We comes with a lifetime warranty against any manufacturer defects. You can trust in the quality and reliability of our products.

name: RIZOM 3-Piece Bolt Cutter Pliers Set, 14" Heavy Duty Bolt Cutter, 8" Mini Bolt Cutter, 8" Wire Cable Cutter with Carrying Bag, Cr-V Blade for Cutting Locks, Steel Wire, Barbed Wire, Chains
short_description: 【Bolt Cutter Pliers Set】The package includes 14" heavy duty bolt cutter, 8" mini bolt cutter and 8" high leverage cable cutter, which are widely used for cutting cables, steel wires, barbed wire, rivets, chains, etc. 【14" Heavy Duty Bolt Cutter】The 14" bolt cutter's cutting capacity is HRC≤48: 3/16inch, HRC≤19: 5/16inch with sharp edges and high-strength jaws up to HRC65, very suitable for cutting bolts, chains and other metal materials. The drop-forged jaw is made of strong and durable chrome vanadium steel, with high hardness, good wear resistance and good cutting performance.Ergonomic PP+TPR handle provides extra comfort while cutting and provide a better grip for more controllable cutting. 【8" Mini Bolt Cutters】This 8" bolt cutter's max cutting capacity is HRC≤15: 1/8" (3.5mm Maximum), HRC≤30: 1/13" (2mm Maximum), very suitable for cutting steel wire, chains, cables, etc. It is not recommended for cutting locks. Its blade is made of industrial-grade chrome vanadium steel, reinforced with high-strength rivets, which is firm and safe. 【8" High Leverage Cable Cutter】The cable cutter is forged with #45 carbon steel, making it sharp, strong, and durable. It can easily cut through aluminum, copper, wire, and even communication cables. 【EASY TO STORE】All cable and bolt cutters are placed in a carrying bag with zipper, easy to access at any time. If you encounter any problems while using our products. Please contact us by email, our professional after-sales team will contact you and solve your problems in time.

name: WORKPRO 8" Mini Bolt Cutter, Heavy Duty Wire Cutters with Ergonomic Handle and Security Lock, High Hardness and High Leverage Steel Bolt Cutters, Chrome Molybdenum Steel Blade
short_description: Drop forged chrome molybdenum steel and powder-coated jaws for sure, efficient cutting and long life Ergonomic bi-material Anti-slip grips provide greater control and comfort in cutting Classic lever-fulcrum design and precisely aligned blades deliver added leverage with less effort Cutting Capacity: 3/32-inch (Steel wire), 13/64-inch (Iron wire), 15/64-inch (Copper wire), 15/64-inch (Wire rope); HRC60-65 Ideal for cutting soft metal, steel wires, small bolts, rods, and rivets
